attributes.action: buy a already working nhs computer system from a manufacturer who has already sold the system and it is known to work
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: having seen newspapers on several occasions about money being spent on a system that does not work. I would ask the govt to buy a system that already is working somewhere and not waste money on building a new system that does not work. the govt can lots of money and spend it on other projects such upgrading its pc to windows 7 and youtube the new version which incorporate sound images :)
